name: Aviary
headline: AI Video Intelligence
description: Aviary Notebook is an AI-powered video notebook that helps you learn faster from videos, and to share and collaborate with video notes.
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:machine-learning; industry:video; industry:search; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Amy Xiao, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder & CEO at Aviary. ex Snapchat, Arize AI, AWS

I’ve been in ML since 2016, starting as one of the first 10 hires at Borealis AI as an ML Research Engineer.

At Snap, I helped build the ML infrastructure on the Perception team, where we delivered Scan, a real-time visual search product.

Most recently, as an ML Solutions Architect at Arize, I worked with top ML teams, across tech and Fortune 200 companies, to advise on observing LLMs/ML models in production and land deals.

generated_description:
### Aviary: Revolutionizing Video Understanding with AI

**Overview:**  
Founded in 2024, Aviary is an innovative startup based in San Francisco, blending artificial intelligence with video analysis. Initially launched as the *Aviary Notebook*, their mission is clear: to enhance video intelligence so users can learn faster and collaborate more effectively through video notes. You can check out their work at [aviary.video](https://aviary.video).

**Team and Background:**  
Aviary is a small but dynamic team of three, participating in the Y Combinator Batch S24. This affiliation with Y Combinator not only lends them credibility but also connects them to a vast network of mentors and resources critical for a startup’s growth. Gustaf Alstromer serves as their Group Partner, guiding their strategic direction.

**What They Offer:**  
Aviary's flagship product is the *Aviary Notebook*, an AI-powered tool designed to make video learning smoother and more efficient. But that’s just the tip of the iceberg. They also provide a suite of creator tools aimed at improving video usability, including:

- **Video Labeler + Tagger:** Organize and categorize videos for easier access.
- **Video Summarizer:** Quickly condense long videos into digestible summaries.
- **Video Chapter Generator:** Automatically create chapters for easy navigation.
- **Video SEO Tag Generator:** Optimize videos for search engines to boost visibility.
- **Video Ad Analyzer:** Evaluate the effectiveness of video ads.

These tools position Aviary as a go-to resource for anyone looking to streamline the management and comprehension of video content.

**Tagline:**  
Aviary is not just about watching videos; it’s about *making sense of them*. Their focus lies in dissecting videos to help users extract valuable insights quickly—a valuable skill in today’s fast-paced world where information overload is the norm.

**Future Implications:**  
With their ambitious goal to reshape video understanding, Aviary stands at the intersection of learning, collaboration, and technology. The video landscape is rapidly evolving, and Aviary is well positioned to lead the charge in AI-driven video intelligence.

**Tags:**  
Aviary is tagged with key themes like AI-enhanced learning, machine learning, and video search, signaling its innovative approach in the ever-growing tech scene of the San Francisco Bay Area. 

As Aviary continues to evolve, they are sure to play a pivotal role in changing how we interact with video content. If you’re interested in modern learning methods or enhancing your video experience, keeping an eye on Aviary could be a wise move.
